author: ryg9705
content: https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/phase0/beacon-chain.md#is_active_validator Minor nitpick. Shouldn't this be "return validator.activation_epoch <= epoch  && epoch < validator.exit_epoch"? Otherwise the statement evaluates to "Bool < Epoch".

author: ajsutton
content: The base penalty for being slashed is currently temporarily reduced which is proving to be quite helpful with a number of people getting slashed.  Has there been any consideration of increasing the rate that penalties ramp up when multiple validators are slashed rather than moving the base penalty back up?  I suspect people are going to keep getting themselves slashed accidentally so would be good to keep the cost of that low if we can still maintain a high cost for coordinated attacks

author: jgm
content: I did suggest an alternative penalty for slashing that was based on the square of the % of validators slashed (as opposed to the current linear) a while back; that would still provide significant punishment in the case of an actual attempted attack, but reduce penalties for the sporadic slashings we're seeing now
